page.title: Photography Gift Cards | Marquel Yvette Photography
page.description: Give the gift of confidence with photography gift cards from Marquel Yvette Photography. Perfect for professionals, graduates, job seekers, and anyone ready to elevate their image.

hero.title: Give the Gift of Confidence
hero.intro: The perfect gift for professionals, graduates, job seekers, or anyone ready to elevate their image.
hero.description: Our photography gift cards can be applied to any headshot session or photography service. Whether it's for a friend starting a new career, a recent graduate, or a colleague who needs to update their LinkedIn profile—give them the confidence that comes with a professional headshot.

benefits.title: Never Expire
benefits.description: Gift cards never expire and can be redeemed for any photography service.

benefits.title: Instant Delivery
benefits.description: Delivered instantly via email—perfect for last-minute gifts!

benefits.title: Any Service
benefits.description: Can be applied to any headshot session or photography package.

benefits.title: Professional Quality
benefits.description: Recipients get the same premium experience and quality as all our clients.

idealFor: Recent graduates entering the job market
Colleagues needing to update their LinkedIn profile
Anyone celebrating a promotion or career milestone
Professionals preparing for a job search
